scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --kill-others "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.docker:dev: docker build -t exam-oefenen . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file .env exam-oefenen
